=Features=
  * All features of the original [http://sunflow.sourceforge.net/ SunFlow].
  * Dynamic loading of primitives, scene parsers, and shaders.
  * [http://freeimage.sourceforge.net/ FreeImage] texture loading, and render saving, supporting all image formats that [http://freeimage.sourceforge.net/ FreeImage] does.
  * Loading of Gzipped scene files, (sc.gz).
